meanings.definition: People who exhibit courage or bravery.
meanings.sent1: The bravers in the story saved the day with their bravery.
meanings.sent2: The community admired the bravers who risked their lives to help others.
meanings.sent3: The bravers were like heroes in a movie, always ready to face any challenge.
meanings.sent4: She stood out among the crowd, a true braver in every sense.
meanings.sent5: The image of the bravers charging into battle stayed with him forever.

meanings.definition: To face danger or difficulty without fear.
meanings.sent1: Despite the danger, he bravers through the storm to rescue the stranded hikers.
meanings.sent2: She bravers every obstacle in her path with determination and courage.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel bravers across the busy road, dodging cars skillfully.
meanings.sent4: He bravers the unknown, venturing into the dark cave without hesitation.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter bravers the flames to save the trapped family inside.

meanings.sent1: Her bravers attitude inspired others to face their fears.
meanings.sent2: The knight's bravers actions on the battlefield earned him respect and honor.
meanings.sent3: The bravers cat fearlessly chased away the larger dog from the yard.
meanings.sent4: The bravers decision to speak up against injustice was commendable.
meanings.sent5: The bravers lion stood proudly at the top of the hill, surveying its territory.
